statements: SELECT supplier_id, report_date, performance_rating, market_insights FROM supplier_reports;
SELECT * FROM supplier_reports WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT report_date, supplier_id, market_insights FROM supplier_reports ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_reports WHERE performance_rating > 4.0;
SELECT supplier_id, report_date FROM supplier_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_reports WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_id, performance_rating FROM supplier_reports WHERE performance_rating > 4.0 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, report_date FROM supplier_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, performance_rating, market_insights FROM supplier_reports WHERE performance_rating < 3.5 OR market_insights LIKE '%competitive%' ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM supplier_reports WHERE performance_rating IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance;
SELECT supplier_id, performance_rating FROM supplier_performance WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT supplier_id, performance_rating, report_date FROM supplier_performance ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_insights WHERE insight_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT insight_id, insight_description FROM market_insights ORDER BY insight_id;
SELECT supplier_id, performance_rating, report_date FROM supplier_performance WHERE supplier_id = 1 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC, report_date ASC
SELECT insight_id, insight_description, insight_date FROM market_insights WHERE insight_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY insight_date ASC
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance WHERE performance_rating > 4.5 AND report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM supplier_performance GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING AVG(performance_rating) > 4.0 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC
SELECT supplier_id, MAX(performance_rating) AS max_rating FROM supplier_performance GROUP BY supplier_id ORDER BY max_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, total_sales FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, total_sales, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE total_sales > 10000;
SELECT supplier_name, total_sales FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE 'San%';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT report_title, report_date, SUBSTRING(report_content, 1, 50) AS short_content FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM insights WHERE insight_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY insight_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT supplier_name, total_sales FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%York%' ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance;
SELECT supplier_name, performance_score FROM supplier_performance;
SELECT insight_description FROM market_insights WHERE insight_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM report_results ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT trend_name FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM supplier_performance WHERE performance_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90;
SELECT i.insight_id, i.insight_description, m.insight_date FROM market_insights i JOIN report_results r ON i.insight_id = r.report_id ORDER BY i.insight_date DESC;
SELECT t.trend_id, t.trend_name, r.report_name FROM trend_analysis t JOIN report_results r ON t.trend_id = r.report_id WHERE r.report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.report_id, r.report_name, COUNT(t.trend_id) AS trend_count FROM report_results r LEFT JOIN trend_analysis t ON r.report_id = t.trend_id GROUP BY r.report_id HAVING trend_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_rating > 4;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_location ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_rating DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_quantity FROM orders WHERE order_quantity < 50 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends WHERE trend_name LIKE '%analytics%';
